To get free points by following: To get free points by following others Instagram accounts click on the "follow" button, then the account will be opened with popUp and after follow CLOSE the popUp yourself. The users who dont close manually the popUp, will not receive points.If You see blank Instagram page with "Oops an error occurred" message, then just click here or visit instagram.com in new browser tab, and then continue to get FREE points.

Get free points by subscribing others Yo: Get free points by subscribing others YouTube Channels You can see which YouTube channel you are trying to subscribe by clicking on the channel title in the widget. You can also skip those you dont want to subscribe.
To get free points by following others T: To get free points by following others TikTok accounts click on the "follow" button, then the account will be opened with popUp and after following CLOSE the popUp yourself. The users who dont close manually the popUp, will not receive points.
To get free points by liking others Soun: To get free points by liking others SoundCloud Tracks click on the "like" button, then the track will be opened with popUp and after like the track CLOSE the popUp yourself. The users who dont close manually the popUp, will not receive points.
o get free points by upvoting others Red: o get free points by upvoting others Reddit Posts or Comments click on the "upvote" button, then the post/comment will be opened with popUp and after upvoting the post/comment CLOSE the popUp yourself.
